scripts.run-deploy: if [ "$npm_execpath" != "C:\\Program Files\\nodejs\\npm-cli.js" ]; then cypress run --spec ./cypress/e2e/deploy/*.cy.js --env token=token,CYPRESS_CONNECT_ADDRESS=$CYPRESS_CONNECT_ADDRESS; else cypress run --spec ./cypress/e2e/deploy/*.cy.js --env token=token,CYPRESS_CONNECT_ADDRESS=%CYPRESS_CONNECT_ADDRESS%; fi;
